channel.title: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!
channel.description:
I've been look for a good 317 server, but every time i try to run whatever client i'm running it never works. I've tried over 15 clients and none of them work. I have a windows 7 (x86), jdk.1.0_11, and jre7. I'm going to show Project one as an example. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=653600.0
the run and compliler starts with jdk1.0_09 on both the client and source (sources always work for me when i change to jdk1.0_11) and I've changed them to jdk.1.0_11. Whenever i run the client this always pops up. http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/Capture_zps1df20039.png.html?postlogin=true This is the code its using: http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/Capture1_zps153c3ba3.png.html?postlogin=true
Whenever i do the compiler this always comes up even when i changed the jdk version to _11 (the one i use). You can also see the code in this picture. http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/Capture3_zps347181df.png.html?postlogin=true
This shows my jdk version: http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/Capture2_zpsb3c1fff1.png.html?postlogin=true
I have skype and i can show my screen people always say its an easy fix but i can't seem to get it my skype is: christian.cullimore

item.title: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“pulverrized, post:5, topic:534828”]i got on a server and made myself owner but the person disabled spawn it says you suck at spawning try again. where would i be able to fix it and what code should i do?[/quote]Please stick with the problem as described in the original thread. In this case, it is a server sided issue and therefore belongs in the Server Help section. I’ve moved your post into the Server Help board for you and renamed the thread so it’s more accurate for your situation.

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!

item.title: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!
item.dc:creator: @pulverrized pulverrized
item.description:
@pulverrized wrote:

i got on a server and made myself owner but the person disabled spawn it says you suck at spawning try again. where would i be able to fix it and what code should i do?

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!

item.title: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“pulverrized, post:3, topic:534828”]I check it and this is how it was:
http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/Capture_zps92fba207.png.html

So i changed it to this: http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/12_zpsca0fc2c9.png.html

whenever i open up the client it now does this: http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/Capture_zps4b0119b0.png.html

anyway to make this work? what do i have to change and where?: http://s1313.photobucket.com/user/pulverrized/media/ewr_zps78f4c8f6.png.html[/quote]
The good news is that it is finding your jdk now.

It is a problem with your cache, It could be that it can’t find it so make sure you put it in your C:/ drive. I would honestly recommend to not use TrisidiaX.

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!

item.title: Cannot find or load main class-- need help!
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

The error is it cannot find your jdk.

Make sure your path is correct to your Jdk and set your environmental variables.

Read full topic
